detail_desc: Baseball shirt in soft jersey with 3/4-length raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a rounded hem.
Satin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and frill-trimmed hems.
Fitted top in a ribbed cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a button placket.

Wide blouse in airy cotton poplin with buttons down the front and a small stand-up collar with a small frill trim and narrow ties at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a slit at the back.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Jacket in faux fur with a round neckline, long sleeves, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Recycled polyester lining.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a broderie anglaise frill around the armholes. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.

Popover jacket in imitation leather with a drawstring hood, zip at the top, drawstring at the waist and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width approx. 6 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lightweight, unlined liner socks in fast-drying functional fabric with reinforcement at the toes and heels.
Pyjamas with a short top and pair of shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend. Wide top with dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Elasticated seam below the bust and detachable twisted ties with tassels.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a shimmering finish. Gently draped neckline at the front, and narrow elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Unlined.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short dress in an airy weave with an opening at the top and small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Short, pleated cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the hems.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.

Straight-cut, checked shirt in an airy cotton-blend weave with wool and viscose. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and gently tapered waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frilled sleeves.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey playsuit with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Erasers in various colours and designs. Size approx. 3 cm. Not for children under 3.
Checked shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Scarf in a patterned weave. Size 90x90 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned weave with a slightly wider neckline, buttoned cuffs and gently rounded hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, visible buttons at the front and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short skirt in a crinkled weave with an elasticated waist and faux wrapover with ties at the front.
Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué and print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Trousers in a cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a drawstring at the front. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with metal flowers.
Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a zip, detachable handle and detachable, adjustable shoulder strap at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 15x31.5x35 cm.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a lace-covered yoke at the front, a button placket and decorative gathers at the front. Long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped tube top in jersey with a sheen. Elastication and a silicone trim at the top.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a pompom trim around the armholes and a crocheted lace trim with fringing at the top.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Top in mesh with beaded and sequin embroidery and frill trims. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, ties at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining at the front. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Shorts in an airy linen and viscose weave with side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.
3/4-length nylon shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and open back pockets. Low crotch and wide legs with wide elasticated hems.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves.

Straight-cut top in patterned lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, inset lace section at the waist and flounce to the hem. Long sleeves with an inset lace section and flounced cuffs.
Fully lined bikini top with mesh and a knot at the front. No fasteners.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.

Fitted, ankle-length jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and cut-out sections at the back. The jumpsuit is made partly from recycled polyester.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in denim with stretch. Regular waist, button fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck and lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cigarette trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem with creases front and back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 10 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit dress in a soft cashmere blend with long raglan sleeves and a button at the back of the neck. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with a turtle neck and cable knitting at the top. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
